long_description: Designed in collaboration with top ice-climbing athletes, the Mountain Hardwear Seraction jacket for men is the ultimate, fully waterproof mixed rock and ice climbing jacket. Shell's 3-layer Dry.Q(TM) Elite waterproof technology starts expelling excess heat and vapor immediately for instant breathability during rigorous climbs. Stretch panels on hood, back and underarms are constructed of 3-layer Dry.Q Elite Stretch for increased mobility and customized fit. Chest pockets feature water-resistant zippers and inner drainage holes for wet gloves. Helmet-compatible hood has easy single-pull adjustment system. Water-resistant Vislon(R) full-length front zipper glides smoothly. Superlight mini pit zips provide instant core ventilation. Mountain Hardwear Seraction jacket for men delivers elite-level performance for only 1 lb.
